<p align="center"><<h1>Instructions how to configure local environment</h1></p>

To configure local environment on your PC you should pass few steps.
To get source code:
1. Downlaod TortoiseSVN(from http://sourceforge.net/projects/tortoisesvn/)
2. Install it in PC
3. Create folder in local hard disk
4. Right click mouse on created folder and choose SVN Checkout...
5. In dialog window paste URL https://taksopark.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ and click "OK" button
6. Wait few seconds for successful updeting project from code.google.com
